title: U.S. Special Envoy for Iran Brian Hook
itunes:title: U.S. Special Envoy for Iran Brian Hook
description:
Kevin spoke with Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News 2020 Politics Editor and Francesca Chambers, White House Correspondent for the Daily Mail. They discussed the house impeachment inquiry and impact on U.S./Ukraine relations.

Kevin also spoke with Brian Hook, U.S. Special Representative for Iran.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
